if-you-like-deskreen-ce-consider-contrib: If you like Deskreen CE, consider contributing financially. Deskreen CE is open-source. Your donations keep us motivated to make Deskreen CE even better.
make-sure-your-computer-and-screen-viewi: Make sure your computer and screen viewing device are connected to same Wi-Fi
or-type-the-following-address-in-browser: Or type the following address in browser address bar on any device
someone-is-trying-to-connect-do-you-allo: Someone is trying to connect, do you allow?
device-is-successfully-disconnected-by-y: Device is successfully disconnected by you. You can connect a new device.
click-to-download-new-updated-version: Click to download new updated version
this-should-match-with-device-ip-display: This should match with Device IP displayed on the screen of device that is trying to connect.
if-ip-addresses-dont-match-click-disconn: If IP addresses don't match click Disconnect button to prevent unauthorized access to your computer screen.
choose-entire-screen-or-app-window-you-w: Choose Entire Screen or App window you want to share
check-if-all-is-ok-and-click-confirm: Check if all is OK and click Confirm
no-i-need-to-choose-other: No, I need to share other thing
now-you-can-see-your-screen-on-other-dev: Now you can see your screen on other device.
you-can-manage-connected-devices-by-clic: You can manage connected devices by clicking Connected Devices button in top panel.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-disconnect-all-: Are you sure you want to disconnect all connected viewing devices?
this-step-can-not-be-undone: This step can not be undone
you-will-have-to-connect-all-devices-man: You will have to connect all devices manually again
a-new-version-of-deskreen-ce-is-availabl: A new version of Deskreen CE is available! Click to download new version
click-to-select-other-screen-source-to-s: Click to select other screen source to share
auto-share-last-entire-screen-source-whe: Auto share last Entire Screen source when device is available
port-is-already-used-by-other-app: Port is already used by other App
click-to-change-deskreen-ce-application-: Click to change Deskreen CE Application Port
type-a-number-from-3000-to-64000-to-use-: Type a number from 3000 to 64000 to use as a Deskreen CE Application Port
type-another-number-in-range-from-3000-t: Type another number in range from 3000 to 64000
i-know-ip-of-my-computer-and-i-want-to-t: I know IP of my computer and I want to type it manually
type-the-ip-you-want-to-ban: Type the IP you want to ban
reset-deskreen-ce-settings-to-default: Reset Deskreen CE settings to default
ask-user-to-enter-password-when-connecti: Ask user to enter password when connecting
autostart-deskreen-ce-app-on-login: Autostart Deskreen CE App on login
open-deskreen-ce-app-window-on-login: Open Deskreen CE App window on login
glory-to-ukraine-glory-to-ukrainian-hero: GLORY TO UKRAINE! GLORY TO UKRAINIAN HEROES!
share-same-screen-to-all-devices: Share same screen to all devices
fix-reset-tooltip: Fix & Reset. Having troubles connecting new clients ? Clicking this button may help you.
share-same-screen-to-all-client-devices: Share same screen to all client devices
deskreen-ce-works-only-with-wifi-and-lan: Deskreen CE works only with WiFi and LAN networks.
click-to-select-another-source-to-share: Click to select another source to share
click-to-select-what-new-clients-will-se: Click to select what new clients will see
enter-the-following-address-in-browser-a: Enter the following address in browser address bar on any device
scan-the-qr-code-to-connect: Scan the QR code to connect
this-screen-source-will-be-seen-by-the-c: This Screen Source will be seen by the client
one-viewing-client-is-connected-already: One viewing client is connected already.
connection-limit-reached-tooltip: Connection limit reached. Disconnect the current viewing client (or wait for it to disconnect) to connect a new one.
deskreen-ce-allows-only-one-client-at-sa: Deskreen CE allows only one client viewing device connected at the same time.
this-will-be-available-only-in-pro-versi: More than one devices connection option will be available only in Pro version.
